image_alt_text: An ornate, rectangular wooden box with hand-painted scenes in imitation lacquer, a central lock, two small interior compartments, and a mirror on the inside of the lid photographed on a white background. The hand-painted scenes depict willow trees, scenes of courtship, charity, battle, and portraits of fashionable men and women.

image_alt_text: Ornate, rectangular chest in wood on a matching four-legged stand with tortoiseshell, mother-of-pearl, and ivory inlay in floral and geometric pattersn and iron fittings. The lid of the chest is open, revealing a geometric inlay interior, a mirror on the top of the lid, and an open interior flap. A drawer on the bottom of the chest has been pulled out a few inches. The objects are photographed on a white background.

The object is photographed on a white background.
